SEARCH

Package com.datastax.astra.client

package com.datastax.astra.client
Core Data API Client Classes. Each class represent a level to interact with the data API.

Usage Logic In a nutshell

// Initialize client
DataAPIClient client = new DataAPIClient("token");;

// Database (crud for collections) work with an assigned namespace
Database db = client.getDatabase("api_endpoint", "default_keyspace");
db.createCollection("my_collection", 4, SimilarityMetric.cosine);

// Access to the data (crud for documents)
Collection<Document> collection = db.getCollection("my_collection");
collection.insertOne(Document.create(1).append("hello", "world"));
collection.insertOne(Document.create(2).append("hello", "world"), new float[] {.1f, .1f, .2f, .3f});
collection.findOne(eq(1)).ifPresent(System.out::println);
collection.deleteOne(eq(1));

// Access Database Administration (crud for namespaces)
DatabaseAdmin dbAdmin = db.getDatabaseAdmin("superUserToken");
dbAdmin.createNamespace("namespace2");

// Access the admin object (crud for databases)
AstraDBAdmin astraDBAdmin  = client.getAdmin("superAdminToken");

    Package
    Description
    com.datastax.astra.client.admin
    Admin Data API Client Classes (ddl on databases and namespaces).
    com.datastax.astra.client.exception
    Specialized exceptions thrown by the Client.
    com.datastax.astra.client.model
    Dto Used in public interfaces: types, documents `*Options``*Resuult`
  • Class
    Description
    Collection<DOC>
    A Data API collection, the main object to interact with the Data API, especially for DDL operations.
    DataAPIClient
    Serves as the primary entry point to the Data API client, offering streamlined access to the functionalities provided by the Data API, whether deployed within Astra environments or on-premise DataStax Enterprise installations.
    DataAPIClients
    Provides utility methods for initializing and configuring clients to interact with the Data API.
    DataAPIOptions
    Options to set up the client for DataApiClient.
    DataAPIOptions.DataAPIClientOptionsBuilder
    Builder for the DataAPIClientOptions.
    DataAPIOptions.DataAPIDestination
    Represent the destination of the data API.
    DataAPIOptions.HttpClientOptions
    Options to set up http Client.
    DataAPIOptions.HttpProxy
    Subclass to represent an http proxy.
    Database
    A Data API database.
